title: South West Tasmania: The Gliders (Captioned)
viewing_guidelines: CAPTIONED: suitable for hearing impaired viewers
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Wilderness areas - Tasmania
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Wilderness areas - Tasmania
description: Episode number 4 of Series "Australian wilderness series". The sheer challenge of remote wilderness is shown in this spectacular program of a group's arduous trek up Federation Peak with the aim of hang gliding from the top. Young and old take part in the trek and viewers share in the thoughts, inspiration and differing goals of the group.
